A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is worse than Rouge One.I had hope as Force Awakens was a great improvement over the more recent Episodes 1-3.  This one was basically a mix of Empire\, Return of Jedi (down to the dialogue and scenes straight up copied) and mixed in with Disney (replete with Mickey Mouse club kids) and stupid out of place jokes. Too many facepalm moments...too predictable because the dialogue was practically copied form original movies! I need to watch Return of the Jedi (for the umpteen time) for a palette cleanser.  This will be the last SW movie I will see. SMH
